about_the_game:
WARNING: This video game may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Player discretion is advised.

Obfuscation is a first person horror game.

Story background:

Waking up in an unfamiliar house, you don't seem to know or remember anything. Explore the house to discover the truth that someone or something is trying to keep in the dark.

Gameplay & Environment:




In Obfuscation, the environment is very interactive. You'll be able to freely interact with almost any objects in the house, inspect them thoroughly, drag them out of their place, and put them into inventory. Search for clues hidden in the house, solve problems that come up in logical ways, experience gripping fear and confusion as inexplicable anomalies haunt your every step, and ultimately find out the truth to escape this nightmare.



A modern house that seems to be mundane, but hidden behind that facade is a prison trapping you in a labyrinth of endless suffering.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains horror themes. It may contain some contents not appropriate for all ages. It may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Player discretion is advised.

name: Obfuscation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Ryzen™ 3
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD Ryzen™ 5
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 2060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Obfuscation is a first-person horror game - experience gripping fear and confusion within an atmospheric setting. Explore your surroundings, interact with the environment, solve problems, and reveal the truth.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
